According to the protocol of the DMCA (Digital Millennium Copyright Act): 

1. We have noted that the  website owned, is offering free downloads of various works belonging to Grupo Planeta, and in particular title "El enredo de la bolsa y la vida", Eduardo Mendoza, work of Seix Barral, GRUPO PLANETA. 

Please note that Grupo Planeta is the exclusive holder, through different legal entities of the Group members, the rights of numerous works that free download is available on its website and in particular, the work cited therefore copying, reproduction, plagiarism, distribution and / or publicly performed without our consent not only contravenes the provisions of the Copyright Spanish Laws. 

Please, find attached the legal information: 

http://www.planetadelibros.com/el-enredo-de-la-bolsa-y-la-vida-libro-67836.html

2. Editorial Seix Barral, S.A.U. Spanish Company, domiciliated 08034 Barcelona (Spain), Avenida Diagonal 662-664, Tel: (+34) 934928164  , Fax: (+34) 934928560, email: acalvog@planeta.es.   

3. We have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above and included in the service are not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the protection of the law.

4. We swear, under penalty of perjury that the information in the notification is accurate and that we own the copyright and are therefore authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
ml
For all the foregoing, I hereby require you to immediately withdraw from its website all the works being owned by companies belonging to Grupo Planeta, and specifically cited the work as indicated in previous lines, leaving distributing them for free.

Sincerely,

Grupo Planeta
Asesoría Jurídica
Avda. Diagonal 662-664, Planta 8ª
08034 Barcelona
Tel.: (+34) 93 492 81 64
Fax: (+34) 93 492 85 60
